seo.title: YakShaver developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a YakShaver Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a YakShaver certified developer!

featureItem.headline: Professional YakShaver Certification
featureItem.text: We recommend that each organization have a certified YakShaver Admin. Upon successful completion of the below steps, your organization will receive 50 credits (valued at $25).

pageBlocks.body:
1\. In your YakShaver portal, add a project called 'Playground' and set the backlog to this public GitHub repo: [https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground](https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground)\
\


2\. Set up a Windows or Mac screenshot tool by following [the docs](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/recording-work-item-snipping-tool).\
Note: this will give you access to keyboard shortcuts.\
\


3\. Read the Shaving [best practices](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/user-mention-guidelines-in-work-item-descriptions).

4\. Do a Shave into the 'Playground' project. In your recording, explain to us:

* The project's location in the portal, and its backlog.
* How you have set up your screen capture tool, and where the videos will go after being recorded?
* Why you must verbally mention the destination project and why you can't just rely on the screen.\
  \


5\. You will receive an email with your badge - accept and share the badge on LinkedIn.\
\
